message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%
That's too greedy Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Okay, I'll go down to 60% this time.  But I'm not going lower. It's your turn to decide if we can reach an agreement.
This is my final offer, Alice. 65% for me, or we walk away with nothing.
